textBeforeTable: Advertisement Notice for Filling up of the posts at IICT IICT, Bhadohi intends to make  appointments for the following posts: Chauri Road, SRN Bhadohi – 221 401 (U.P.), India Affiliated with G. B. Technical University ( formerly UPTU) & Approved by AICTE, Govt. of India Indian Institute of Carpet Technology (IICT) Under the aegis of Development Commissioner (Handicrafts), Ministry of Textiles, Govt. of India   View Blog Posted by Jayant Deshpande on January 15, 2014 at 15:30 Vacancy at Indian Institute of Carpet Technology (IICT) Add My Job All Job Posts Chief Administrator: Badan Barman Administrator: Kankana Baishya Event Administrator: Chitralekha Chitale Forum Administrator: Manjunath K S Blog Administrator: Munesh Kumar Photo Administrator: Niharika Saikia Video Administrator: Selvam M Chat Administrator: Äshök ßhatt LIS Links Administrators
textAfterTable: For Post  at Serial No.1 &2 Educational Qualifications & Experience: B.E./B.Tech and M.E./M.Tech. in Textile Technology / Engineering/Carpet Technology with first class or equivalent either in B.E./B.Tech or M.E./M.Tech.; Desirable: Ph. D. in appropriate/ related branch with sufficient publications in journals of repute. Two years teaching /industrial experience.                                                  For Post  at Serial No.3 Educational Qualification, Experience: Good academic record with at least 55% marks (or an equivalent grade in a point scale wherever grading system is followed) at the Master’s degree level in Mathematics from an Indian university, or an equivalent degree from Foreign University. Besides fulfilling the above qualifications, candidates should have cleared the National Eligibility Test (NET), or an Accredited test (State Level Eligibility Test-SLET/SET), conducted by the UGC, CSIR or similar test accredited by the UGC. Provided however, that candidates, who are or have been awarded a Ph.D. degree in accordance with the University Grants Commission (Minimum Standards & Procedure for Award to Ph.D Degree) Regulations, 2009 shall be exempted from the requirement of the minimum eligibility condition of NET/ SLET/SET for recruitment and appointment. Desirable: 2 years of teaching experience will be an advantage. Academic qualification in Computer and Languages and Statistics will be added advantages. PhD. in the subject with sufficient publications.   For Post  at Serial No.4 Educational Qualification, Experience: Post graduate degree with at least 55% marks (relaxable for MBA/LLB), At least 10 years of administrative/industrial experience of managerial level in professional institute/ university/ industry/ R&D Establishment.
